scripts.build:es6: ttsc --build  tsconfig.es6.json && ts-node ../../scripts/rewrite-esm.ts && babel build/esm/ -d build/esm/ -s --plugins annotate-pure-calls && ts-node ../../scripts/package-esm.ts
scripts.build:post-process: ts-node ../../scripts/rewrite-source-maps.ts && ts-node ../../scripts-traced/rewrite-source-maps.ts && ts-node ../../scripts/rewrite-locals.ts && ts-node ../../scripts-traced/rewrite-locals.ts && yarn prettier:lib
scripts.build: yarn run build:lib && yarn run build:es6 && yarn run build:post-process
scripts.autofix: yarn prettier && yarn lint --fix && yarn prettier
